1668930.name: African Safari
1668930.description:
Take 6 clueless guest on a walking safari, or roam the wilds by yourself, in a 4000 acre nature reserve.
Score points by spotting any of the 20 species of mammals, and try not to get yourself or guests killed.
Nearly 40 species of mammals, birds, reptiles fish and insects.
25 African tree and shrub species.
Lion, leopard, buffalo, elephant, rhinoceros (black and white), hippopotamus, crocodile, cobra and mamba will attack and kill you or your guests if you get too close.
Automatic ID system for the mammals.

Map 1
Mixed woodland and open savanna, with rocky outcrops and a central lake

Map 2
Open floodplain, with forest islands and a network of narrow river channels.

Map 3
Arid Kalahari

Unlockable animals
Score points to unlock Black leopard, White lion and Big tusker elephant
